# VS Studio Tips

## cool plugins

- git lens
- Anaconda Extension
- Markdown Preview


## Shortcuts
- Strg + # - mulitline Comment
- strg + c - quit infinite loop
- strg + shift +  P
- strg + k  s save all (Press ctrl + k, release and thren press s)

## Git workflow

### basic workflow

1. strg+shift+p -> git stage all
2. "" -> git commit all
3. -> git push
